data.script:
<script>
    import {
        Button,
        Card,
        ContextButton,
        Overlay,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Button for="overlay-auto-focus" palette="accent">
    Open AUTO FOCUSED Modal
</Button>

<Overlay logic_id="overlay-auto-focus">
    <Card.Container palette="auto" max_width="75">
        <Card.Header>AUTO FOCUSED Modal</Card.Header>

        <Card.Footer>
            <ContextButton
                palette="inverse"
                variation="clear"
                tabindex="1"
            >
                Index #1
            </ContextButton>

            <ContextButton
                palette="inverse"
                variation="clear"
                tabindex="2"
            >
                Index #2
            </ContextButton>
        </Card.Footer>
    </Card.Container>
</Overlay>
data.title: Overlay Auto Focus
